data_table.description: This subject sample mapping data table includes a mapping of study subject IDs to sample IDs, sample aliases, and sample use.

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Seq_DNA_SNP: SNP genotypes derived from sequence data; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing
